description: Returns a list of all CloudWatch Logs account policies in the account. To use this operation, you must be signed on with the correct permissions depending on the type of policy that you are retrieving information for.

parameters.name: policyType
parameters.description: Use this parameter to limit the returned policies to only the policies that match the policy type that you specify.

parameters.name: accountIdentifiers
parameters.description: If you are using an account that is set up as a monitoring account for CloudWatch unified cross-account observability, you can use this to specify the account ID of a source account. If you do, the operation returns the account policy for the specified account. Currently, you can specify only one account ID in this parameter. If you omit this parameter, only the policy in the current account is returned. (string) ---

nested_items.name: accountPolicies
nested_items.description: An array of structures that contain information about the CloudWatch Logs account policies that match the specified filters.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the account policy.

nested_items.name: policyDocument
nested_items.description: The policy document for this account policy.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that this policy was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: policyType
nested_items.description: The type of policy for this account policy.

nested_items.name: scope
nested_items.description: The scope of the account policy.

nested_items.name: selectionCriteria
nested_items.description: The log group selection criteria that is used for this policy.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that the policy applies to.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of items. The token expires after 24 hours.
